InfluenceRule.name: Very likely to confide in people you trust
Honest people like to confide
Dishonest people don't like to confide
Self-destructive people confide in people they don't know very well
Emotional people like to confide in others
Humble people like to confide in others
People afraid of commitment don't like to confide
Inarticulate people don't like to confide
Shallow people don't like to confide
Deep people like to confide
Mopey people like to confide
Insecure people like to confide
Attention hogs like to confide
Heartbroken people like to confide
Anxious people like to confide
Sad people like to confide
Embarrassed people like to confide
Less likely to confide in people you don't like very much
More likely to confide in people who aren't very cool
Less likely to confide in cheaters
More likely to confide in someone who wants the same things you do
More likely to confide in someone who's been romantic to you
More likely to confide in someone who's been nice to you
Less likely to confide in someone who's done something rude to you
Less likely to confide in someone who's done something taboo
Less likely to confide in someone who's done something mean
Less likely to confide in someone you used to date
More likely to confide if mutual enemy
if you're in a complex relationship you want to confide
if dishonest more likely to want people to confide in you
if emotional more likely to want people to confide in you
if you take things slowly more likely to want people to confide in you
if deep more likely to want people to confide in you
if sympathetic much more likely to want people to confide in you
if loving more likely to want people to confide in you
if kind more likely to want people to confide in you
if loyal more likely to want people to confide in you
if cold less likely to want people to confide in you
if irritable less likely to want people to confide in you
if you envy someone more like to want them to confide
if desperate more like to want someone to confide in you
if feel out of place more like to want someone to confide in you
more likely to want someone you're into to confide in you
less likely to want someone cool to confide in you
More likely to accept confide if mutual enemies

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% confided in %r% and %pron(r,he/she)% lent a sympathetic ear
%i% got all TMI with %r%
%i% confided %pron(i,his/her)% lame interest in %CKB_((i,likes),(,),(lame))%s to %r% and %pron(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% totally cool about it
%list(i,r,and)% bonded over %list(i,r,our/their)% mutual interest in %CKB_((i,likes),(r,likes),(lame))%s
%list(i,r,and)% bonded over complaining about %o%
%i% unwisely complained about %o% to %r%
%list(i,r,and)% built %list(i,r,our/their)% romance into a friendship through trust and learning
%i% bonded with %r% over %pron(i,his/her)% adorable secret
%i% fessed up about seeing %rp% %o%, but made an ally in the process
%i% confessed about seeing %o% to %r%
%i% texted that horrible secret to %r%
%i% admitted to %r% that %pron(i,he/she)% stole a top from the Mariano store and %rs% threatened to leak %pron(i,his/her)% secret
%i% became friends %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were enemies by sharing an embarrassing secret
%i% foolishly told an embarrassing secret to %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were enemies
%r% acted like a jerk when %i% tried to confide in %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% vented to %r% about %pron(i,his/her)% trip to the mall
%i% told secrets to %r% in a language %prons(r,he/she)% didn't speak
%r% gave some old-world advice to %i% and %list(i,r,we/they)% became friends
%i% needed someone to talk to about %o% so %prons(i,he/she)% became friends with %r%
%r% didn't feel comfortable talking with %i% about %o% behind %pron(o,his/her)% back
%list(i,r,and)% became friends over %list(i,r,our/their)% mutual hatred for %o%
%i% confided in %r% about %pron(i,his/her)% cheating
%i% confided in %r% about stealing %op% date
%i% snickered with %r% about stealing %op% date
%i% confided in %r% about %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend's infidelity
%r% refused to get involved with %ip% cheating drama
%list(i,r,and)% bonded over complaining about %o%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, hi, %r%. Hey... I wanted to tell you something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... %random(I... I was adopted,sometimes... I still play with dolls,I have a crush on our history teacher,I... I've always preferred the metric system,I... I have a terrible terrible fear of small furry animals,I have a terrible terrible fear of bus drivers,I... I'm a world ranked croquet player)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...that's okay, %i%. We all have issues.
Hey, thanks for confiding in me. We should spend more time together.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, hi, %r%. Hey... I wanted to tell you something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... %random(sometimes I fart when I laugh,I've had pinkeye like four times,I've had lice like four times,I really really like wearing spandex,sometimes I have dreams where you're my mom,I really really like doing math story problems,I like to eat the food from the cafeteria)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh.... oh. Yeah. Uh... thanks for sharing. I'm gonna go over here now.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... this is kind of embarrassing, but I wanted you to know something about me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, ok... what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I really like %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh. Well, that's okay, %i%. Everyone has faults. Sometimes they're even a little endearing.
Hey, you're a pretty honest %gender(i,guy,girl)%. We should hang out more often.

Instantiation.name: ConfideIn - Both Like Something Lame Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... this is kind of embarrassing, but I wanted you to know something about me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, ok... what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... I really like %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%! Me too! That's totally %positiveadj%. Maybe we can hang out sometime and talk %toc1%s?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Hey.. you'll never believe what happened between me and %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh oh... what was it?
%shocked%! What a jerk. I can't believe you put up with %gender(o,his,her)% crap.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... sorry for venting, I just wanted to tell someone.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Any time. And hey, if you need to vent any more in the future, just text me and we'll chill.

Instantiation.name: ConfideIn - Something Mean Reject because friends

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! Hey.. you'll never believe what happened between me and %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What happened?
Heh heh, sounds like something %gender(o,he,she)%'d do. I wouldn't take it personally, %gender(i,man,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you on crack? I can't believe you don't see what a jerk %gender(o,he,she)% is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, back off, %gender(i,buddy,honey)%. Don't go around attacking my friends if you want to get on my good side.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. I've got something really important I need to get off my chest.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%! Does this mean you want to start confiding in me like a real relationship?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I dunno... It's pretty bad, I don't think you're still going to want to be with me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh come on, it can't be that bad. I know you!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... It's just that %random(I cut my sandwiches into funny shapes,I'm unhealthily addicted to muffins,I like the way glass cleaner smells,sometimes I dress in my grandpa's clothes)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: O...Oh... Is that all? That's okay %sweetie%. I'm sure there's medicine or some kind of treatment for those kinds of things....

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You mean you don't think it's weird?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, it's certainly weird. But that's okay. We'll get through it together.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, if it isn't %r%... You're looking mighty fine today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Thanks, %i%. What's on your mind?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's funny you ask... I sort of have something I wanted to tell you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well... %random(I still wear superhero underwear,I'm still afraid of the dark,I still watch Saturday morning cartoons,I still like to draw in coloring books)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Awe, really? That's actually kind of adorable.
But hey, that's totally cool of you to trust me enough to confide in me like that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks %r%. Hey, friends?
And maybe... someday - something more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: One thing at a time, %gender(i,cowboy,cowgirl)%.

Instantiation.name: ConfideIn - Break the News (stealing R's love) Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Please don't be mad, but I need to tell you something and I need you to be understanding.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it? I feel I'm a pretty understanding person.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... We'll see. So you know %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes...? I'll say. I've been dating %pron(o,him/her)%. I know %pron(o,him/her)% pretty well.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah well, actually... %gender(o,He,She)% has been dating me too.
Yeah. I know. It's messed up. That's why I think we should be friends.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why would I ever want to be friends with you!? You're seeing MY %gender(o,BOYFRIEND,GIRLFRIEND)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Don't you get it? We're puppets to %pron(o,his/her)% desires. The only way we're going to get out of this is if we do it together.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're right. Crazy as it is. You're right. Friends with a common cause.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Let's do this.

Instantiation.name: ConfideIn - Break the News (stealing R's love) Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I need to tell you something, but you're not going to believe me and if you do - you're going to hate me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No way, what is it? I won't hate you. It can't be that bad.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, seriously. It's bad. I can't take this guilt anymore, I need to get this off my chest. I'm tired of being part of %pron(o,his/her)% games.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, come on - it can't be that bad. It's not like you're seeing %o% behind my back or something.
%i%...? Are you serious? No. You're not. Really!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's true. We've been dating, but I'm so sick of it all! I never wanted to be with %pron(o,him/her)%! I just wanted to be your friend... But things got complicated.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't look at you right now. I need fresh air.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey... %r%... I like... I need to talk to somebody about something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's cool. What's wrong? I can totally help.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's embarassing... I can't say it. I'm not good at these sorts of things.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Um... Okay... Maybe if you texted it to me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah! Good idea!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sure it's not that bad anyways. I think you're probably just over-reacting.
OH MY GOD! WHOA %gender(i,DUDE,CHICK)%! You need to get that checked and out of my FACE!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...I tried to warn you...

Instantiation.name: ConfideIn - (SS6 Act-2) Monica tries to tell %r% that she stole a top, doesn't go well.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%. What's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So... when I was at the Mariano store a few days ago I stole a top.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Did they catch you?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well I kinda just walked out with it...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well too bad they didn't catch you.
Let me just get the news out to everyone so they will know where to find you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Last time I go to you for anything!
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just hoping we could maybe stop being enemies.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't see that happening... like ever.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well listen, how about this... I could tell you something I've never told anyone else.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, this ought to be good.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Okay. Uh... %random(I still like to watch children shows in my off time,I can't go to the bathroom in public restrooms,Drawing unicorns and ponies is a guilty pleasure of mine,I still wear superhero underwear)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, you're serious. I'm still not over being enemies with you, but I guess I can keep your secret safe for now.
But you just remember what I know, %buddy%. You just remember that before you think about doing anything to me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I guess I'll chalk this up as a win for me...
Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you want %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was just hoping we could maybe stop being enemies.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't see that happening... like evar.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well listen, I could tell you something I've never told anyone else.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This could be interesting...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I still like to watch children shows in my off time,I can't go the bathroom in public restrooms,Drawing unicorns and ponies is a guilty pleasure of mine,I still wear superhero underwear)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's rich. I'm going to text this to everyone now!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I have something I need to tell you. You're probably going to hate me for it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Don't be silly. What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just... can't... deal with your NAME! '%r%'. It's so lame.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm sorry to hear that, but it's nothing either of us can do anything about. I don't hold it against you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So we can still be friends?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure! I would never let something like that get between us.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I need to tell you something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I need someone to listen to my problems, and share secrets with.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well that sucks. What do you want me to do about it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I was hoping... you could be that person.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: This is boring. I have to go.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just needed a friend, you didn't have to be a jerk about it.
Hey %r%, can I tell you about some things?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uhh, sure?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, yesterday I went all the way to the mall and just as I got there I realized I forgot my phone. Don't you just hate that?
But it sucked because there was this total hottie there and I just couldn't work up the courage to give them my number.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I ...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: And I keep kicking myself for not doing it and then I finally did, but I totally forgot my number since I didn't have my phone on me.
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't really...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I think I just at least need a hug, can you do that?
That's better. Thanks for listening. We should definitely hang out more often.
See Ya.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's up %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are we friends enough to talk about secret things?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You don't really have to ask about that. Normally you just say something personal and I decide if I should tell everyone or not.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know how to say this in your language, but %positiveadj%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well regardless of whatever you just said, I'll make sure to keep it safe with me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%. What is up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just don't know who else to turn to. I figure you're not from our country, maybe you would have a different perspective.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'll whisper it... *whisper whisper*

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well my friend, in my country we always just say %positiveadj%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What does that mean?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I think it means something about not worrying for awhile, or chickens. Either way, I will keep your secret safe with me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks, %buddy%.
Hey %r%, could I talk to you about some things?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: There are just some things that I can't tell my %sweetie% %o% that I need someone to talk to about.
And I figure that since you are friends with %o%, you could help me out.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, %i%. I can be your confidante.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks for understanding, %r%.
%greeting%, %r%. Hey, so there are some things I need to get off my chest that I just can't tell my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)% %o%.
I figured since you know %pron(o,him/her)% pretty well, I could talk to you about them.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't know about that, %i%. %o% and I are pretty tight, and I don't know you all that well.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... well never mind, then.
%r%, can I tell you something in confidence?

OK. I just can't stand %o%. %gender(o,His,Her)% %random(weird,unnatural,disgusting)% %random(hair,clothes,shoes)%, that %random(awful,ear-piercing,grating)% %random(laugh,voice)%... everything about that %gender(o,kid,girl)% disgusts me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I feel the same way. I mean, what a %pejorative%. I'd rather %random(be eaten by gerbils,get caught in a blender,die in a slasher flick,die in a fire)% than hang out with %gender(o,him,her)%.
You're pretty chill, %i%. We should hang out more.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I agree.

Instantiation.name: Confide In Accept - I'm a cheater

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... I have a confession to make.
I'm... I'm cheating on %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: omg! How long has this been going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not long. It just sort of happened, you know?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: And is %o% okay with this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well, %pron(o,he/she)%%if(0, *is* pretty open-minded...)else(...no. Definitely not.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, %i%. You've got to do something about this. You need to talk to both of them, work it out. Otherwise it's going to be *major* drama.
And we *so* do not need that during prom week.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks, %r%. You're a good friend.

Instantiation.name: Confide In Accept - I'm a homewrecker and feel bad

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... I have something I need to tell you.
I sort of got into a new relationship with someone who's already in one. Now %o% probably thinks I'm a terrible person for stealing %pron(o,his/her)% date.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: omg! How long has this been going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not long. It just sort of happened, you know? I never wanted to make %o% feel bad.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Have you talked to %o% about this? Maybe that would be best.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's complicated...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, welcome to real life. You'll get through it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks for listening, %r%. You're a good friend.

Instantiation.name: Confide In Accept - I'm a homewrecker and feel good

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... you'll never guess what's going on. Can you keep a secret?
I totally stole %op% significant other.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(omg,Get out,No way,Actually I heard all about that already)%. How long has this been going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Not long. It was pretty delicious. I feel like such a bad %gender(i,boy,girl)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just make sure this doesn't lead to a lot of 'prama,' %buddy%. We wouldn't want a big scene.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can handle it.
Thanks for being cool, %r%. You're a good friend.

Instantiation.name: Confide In Accept - I'm being cheated on

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%... you'll never guess what's going on. Can you keep a secret?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's %o%. %gender(o,He,She)%'s... %gender(o,He,She)%'s cheating on me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(1,Don't cry. Maybe your sweetie's just exploring new avenues for self-expression.)else(That's terrible. I'm so sorry.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know what to do. I thought maybe I was in love with %pron(o,him/her)%, but now...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look. You've got to talk to %pron(o,him/her)% about this, let %pron(o,him/her)% know you're not okay with it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're right, %r%. Thanks for being there for me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,No prob,Totally)%, %buddy%.

Instantiation.name: Confide In Reject - I'm being cheated on

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... I need someone to talk to. Can you keep a secret?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, as long as it's not very interesting.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's %o%. %gender(He,She)%'s... %gender(He,She)%'s cheating on me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(1,Don't cry. Maybe your sweetie's just exploring new avenues for self-expression.)else(Oh noes or whatever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't know what to do. I thought maybe I was in love with %pron(o,him/her)%, but now...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, look, I *really* don't need any more drama in my life right now. This sounds like a massive angst bomb and I'd rather just stay out of the blast radius if you don't mind.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I... I just needed a friend.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sorry, %gender(i,kid,honey)%, I've got my own problems.
